meanings.definition: A person who is the first to find or learn about something
meanings.sent1: The discoverers of the hidden treasure were overjoyed.
meanings.sent2: The discoverers of the ancient ruins shared their findings with the world.
meanings.sent3: The discoverers of the secret recipe were surprised by its simplicity.
meanings.sent4: The discoverers of new lands faced many challenges on their journey.
meanings.sent5: The discoverers of the rare flower were celebrated for their keen observation skills.

meanings.definition: Those who explore new territories or make new findings
meanings.sent1: The brave discoverers ventured into the uncharted forest.
meanings.sent2: The discoverers of scientific breakthroughs often face skepticism at first.
meanings.sent3: The discoverers of the hidden cave had a picnic inside to celebrate.
meanings.sent4: The discoverers of innovative technologies shape the future.
meanings.sent5: The discoverers of the lost city were hailed as heroes by the locals.
